name: Glutinous Rice
description:
Glautinous Rice is a multiplayer competitive infinite runner, developed in unity for this project. The game consists of two players each represented by a different skin of their choice from the four available.The skins depict a mochi, Japanese sticky rice cake. The players must jump over obstacles to avoid getting eliminated. In retrospect the game is about quick pacing mochis jumping over obstacles to avoid death.º

Press the "Start Game" button and Go racing. 

 Key "Up" for jumping- Player 1

Key "W" for jumping- Player 2

key "R" is for reset/ restart the game
